verses.verse: (For the choir director; on stringed instruments. A Psalm of Asaph, a Song.) <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And His <S%H5520>tabernacle<s%> is in <S%H8004>Salem;<s%> His <S%H4585>dwelling<s%> <S%H4585>place<s%> also is in <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

<S%H8033>There<s%> He <S%H7665>broke<s%> the <S%H7565>flaming<s%> <S%H7198>arrows,<s%> The <S%H4043>shield,<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and the <S%H4421>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

The <S%H47>stouthearted<s%> <S%H3820><s%> were <S%H7997>plundered;<s%> They <S%H5123>sank<s%> into <S%H8142>sleep;<s%> And <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the <S%H2428>warriors<s%> <S%H376><s%> could <S%H4672>use<s%> his <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
At Thy <S%H1606>rebuke,<s%> O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> Both <S%H7393>rider<s%> and <S%H5483>horse<s%> were <S%H7290>cast<s%> into a <S%H7290>dead<s%> <S%H7290>sleep.<s%>
Thou, even Thou, art to be <S%H3372>feared;<s%> And <S%H4310>who<s%> may <S%H5975>stand<s%> in Thy <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H4480>when<s%> <S%H9241>once<s%> Thou art <S%H639>angry<s%>?
Thou didst cause <S%H1779>judgment<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3372>feared,<s%> and was <S%H8252>still,<s%>
When <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> to <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> To <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6035>humble<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
For the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> Thee; With a <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H2534>wrath<s%> Thou shalt <S%H2296>gird<s%> Thyself.

<S%H5087>Make<s%> <S%H5087>vows<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H9608>fulfill<s%> [them]; Let <S%H3605>all<s%> who are <S%H5439>around<s%> Him <S%H2986>bring<s%> <S%H7862>gifts<s%> to Him <S%H4172>who<s%> is to be <S%H4172>feared.<s%>
He will <S%H1219>cut<s%> <S%H1219>off<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H5057>princes;<s%> He is <S%H3372>feared<s%> by the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
